item.title: Monitoring .NET Applications with OpenTelemetry and Grafana
item.description: Instrumenting your .NET apps with OpenTelemetry is easy. But what about actually seeing those metrics and traces in action? Here's how to stream observability data from your .NET services into Grafana â€” in just a few lines of code. Link to article: https://www.milanjovanovic.tech/blog/monitoring-dotnet-applications-with-opentelemetry-and-grafana
